dictionary.description: A jewel type monster that is even larger and even more voracious than the Jewel King. Not only does it hold the gems it's eaten in its body, but those gems also merge together producing even more precious jewels making it is even more valuable than the others. Naturally, there are many Jewel God related crimes, there being a high number of counterfeits, abductions, and scams.
dictionary.summon:
I can still eat.
Give me more gems, please!
My belly is bottomless!
